Html: I know CrmRestKit supports Q promises. Looking at the code for XrmServiceToolkit I don't see any Q promise support. I know I can wrap this in Q promises fairly easily but I am curious if you guys plan on adding in Q promise support directly into XrmServiceToolkit?

Hi There.

Currently I have no plans to add support of Q promises. Would be keen to have a look and learn when you get the integration done.

Kind Regards,
